scripts.update-prices: [ -f .env ] && set -a && . ./.env && set +a || true; curl -X GET "http://${COOLIFY_SERVICE_NAME:-localhost}:3000/api/cron/update-prices" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CRON_SECRET}"
scripts.process-transak-savings: [ -f .env ] && set -a && . ./.env && set +a || true; curl -X GET "http://${COOLIFY_SERVICE_NAME:-localhost}:3000/api/cron/process-transak-savings" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CRON_SECRET}"
scripts.update-flp-tokens: [ -f .env ] && set -a && . ./.env && set +a || true; curl -X GET "http://${COOLIFY_SERVICE_NAME:-localhost}:3000/api/cron/update-flp-tokens" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CRON_SECRET}"
scripts.vesting-trigger: [ -f .env ] && set -a && . ./.env && set +a || true; curl -X GET "http://${COOLIFY_SERVICE_NAME:-localhost}:3000/api/cron/vesting-trigger" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CRON_SECRET}"
